items.title: Red Crescent calls for inquiry into Israel's killing of Gaza paramedics
items.description: The organisation says the attack by Israeli troops on a convoy of ambulances constitutes a "fully-fledged war crime".

items.title: Trump asks US Supreme Court to block return of wrongly deported man
items.description: The administration argues that El Salvador cannot be compelled to return Mr Kilmar Abrego Garcia to the US.

items.title: Belgian prince loses bid for benefits on top of Â£300k royal allowance
items.description: Court rejects claim by Prince Laurent, who said he was acting out of "principle" rather than for money.

items.title: Dozens die after torrential rain hammers Congolese capital
items.description: Kinshasa is prone to soil erosion and the president warned the climate crisis is making flooding worse.

items.title: Gaza air strikes follow heaviest rocket fire by Hamas in months
items.description: A journalist is reportedly killed in a strike at a hospital compound after 10 rockets are fired into Israel.
